subtitle: Baby doesn’t want to eat solid food
title: Worried Dad
content:
My baby is 9 months old. His weight is 7 kg. He’s not eating much solid food other than breastfeed. Whatever breastfeed he’s taking that’s also pretty little. 
We’ve tried giving him khichuri, mashed rice and milk, potato, fish, fruits and everything. He eats everything but only a small bit. Whenever we try to feed him a little more, he starts crying. It’s like he just doesn’t want to eat anything other than breast-milk. 

I am worried that he isn’t getting enough food and he’s not growing enough. Is his weight enough for the age? 

**APONJON HELP: Be patient.Try giving your baby different food at different time. See what he likes. Give him more of the food he likes. Encourage him to eat. Gradually, he will develop a habit. 
Your child would’ve been underweight if it were any less. You can give him vitamin syrup as well.**
